summary: Six kidnapped teens awake in an abandoned factory to discover they're being filmed for a twisted and terrifying reality show.
cast: Alethea Kutscher|Erin Consalvi|Brad Ashten|Carlee Avers|Kariem Marbury|Soren Bowie|Eric Francis|Jennifer Cozza James|Brent Fidler|Rydell Danzie|Madison Dylan|Patricia Place|John Jolly|Minh Tuan Nguyen|Amy Lyndon|Caia Coley
keywords: slasher|reality show|abandoned factory|falling down stairs|walking on broken glass
title: Are You Scared?
